sgcool_label_text:Published in 1967
 Liberte/ Merdeka is a folio of prints produced by artists associated with the Bandung Technological Institute (ITB). This interesting set of prints was essentially the artists’ interpretation of noted Surrealist poet
 Paul Eluard’s poem Liberte. Consisting of the ‘who’s who’ of the ‘Bandung School’ of artists
 this folio of prints can be seen both as an experimental publication in terms of the art-literary collaboration
 and also the promotion of the print-making medium within the Indonesian context.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Published in 1967, Liberte/ Merdeka is a folio of prints produced by artists associated with the Bandung Technological Institute (ITB). This interesting set of prints was essentially the artists’ interpretation of noted Surrealist poet, Paul Eluard’s poem Liberte. Consisting of the ‘who’s who’ of the ‘Bandung School’ of artists, this folio of prints can be seen both as an experimental publication in terms of the art-literary collaboration, and also the promotion of the print-making medium within the Indonesian context.
